## Safety Cameras & Driver Monitoring

connected to the AUTOsist Portal. Monitor driver behavior for harsh breaking,
speeding and scoring, with in cab alerts for violations.

## GPS & Fuel Card Integrations

Bring fuel purchase and efficiency data and odometer tracking into a single

real time GPS location tracking.

## One dashboard for all of your fleet  
management needs

### Key Features

### Preventative Maintenance Schedules

Track completed maintenance with receipt and document upload

### Digital Inspections

Build custom checklists with notifications for items marked not in proper
working order

### Reminders

You and your team can get push notifications and email reminders by date
and/or odometer

### Service History Tracking

Easily track all completed maintenance for your fleet. Attach receipts and
other documents and keep everything organized.

### Work Orders

Keeping track of your fleet maintenance work orders is essential for every
business to run efficiently.

### Fuel Management

Track your fill ups and costs for fuel. Integrate easily with fuel cards or
upload your data

### Parts Inventory Management

Track parts and keep inventory counts. Get alerts when things are running low
in your stock.

### User Management

Assign users to specific vehicles/assets with permission control

### Trip Log

Track miles or hours for your units. Easily differentiate business for
personal.

### Document Management

Manage miscellaneous documents such as registration, insurance, warranty and
more.

### Custom Reports

See monthly/annual spending on maintenance, service and more.

### Equipment Management

Ensure proper maintenance of your equipment and trailers for maximum
productivity and longevity.

###  GPS Tracking and Safety Cameras

Track your fleet’s location, odometer readings, DTC fault code alerts and
dual-facing cameras for driver safety

###  Safety Dash Cams

Two-way facing HD dash cams with live feeds for safety, insurance compliance
and accident risk prevention

###  FLEET MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE

Simple and affordable software and app to better manage your fleet operations

  
  
  
  

  
  
  
  

## What Makes Our Fleet Maintenance System Different?

### SIMPLE TO USE

We pride ourselves on building fleet management software that’s easy to use so
your teams can adopt it quickly. What good is software if your team doesn't
use it? Our features focus on the important things that matter without all the
clutter and confusion.

### 24/7 SUPPORT

We offer 24/7 customer support and dedicated account managers to ensure you
are successful. We understand the challenges of implementing new software and
know how to make it easy for your teams to adopt it.  
  

### MOBILE FOCUSED

We make it easy to manage your fleet on the go. Our mobile app is available
for both iOS and Android and works seamlessly with any type of phone or
tablet. Your team can quickly check service history, fuel, receive reminders,
complete inspections, and more.

  
  
  
  

## See how AUTOsist simplifies fleet Management

Schedule a live demo and/or start a free trial of our Fleet Maintenance
Software
